nodes.text: Star Wars Treasury: The Original Trilogy

Star Wars Treasury: The Original Trilogy is a 224-page hardcover story collection retelling the Star Wars original trilogy as written by Ryder Windham and illustrated by Brian Rood. It was published by Egmont UK Ltd on November 5, 2015. Star Wars Treasury: The Original Trilogy uses much of the same artwork featured in a similar hardcover story collection, The Original Trilogy Stories. The book is a republished edition of Star Wars in Pictures: The Original Trilogy which was published in Australia by Hardie Grant Books a few months earlier, on August 1, 2015.
